attributes.action: tell Shahid Malik (Dewsbury MP) to get out of London/Pakistan/Anywhere else BUT Dewsbury to actually do some work IN Dewsbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Shahid Malik was voted in to power as Dewsbury Local Councillor he has been seen less and less in Dewsbury every week. He spends more time in other places when he needs to help sort out the future of our town.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
